I have a server at home and play to an HDTV using the Avel Linkplayer2.  It upconverts the signal, plays Divx over the network, or Divx on DVD or thumbdrive.  Also streams MP3's and pics to TV and surround sound...Coaxial digital audio.  This thing rocks...
